text: Jwalakwe ni Ajula jwaakunkombolasya ŵanganyammwe kwenda pankuli ni pambwani, kwikanila ndema jankuŵaga mu yombo, nikwendaga nao (yomboyo) ni mbungo jambone, ŵanganyao nikusengwa nayo, (mwatwitu!) mbungo jachimbunga nikuiŵichilila (yomboyo), nikwaŵichilila soni ŵanganyao matumbela kuumila mbali ni mbali, kaneka ŵanganyao nikulupilila yanti asyungulilidwe (ni chonasiko); akasam’bendaga Allah mwakunswejechesya dini Jakwe (pakum’benda Jwelepejo, achitiji): “Naga nkwika mwakutujokola mu yalakweyi chisimu chene chituŵe mu ŵakutogolela.”
